resources.string: Navigating back will shutdown the server and will not allow any more messages to be sent. this will also get rid of any of the messages sent and images downloaded as part of the chat. If you would like to go back press the confirmation button below.
Navigating back will disconnect you from the server. This will also delete all of the messages and images that were sent in the chat that have not been saved on the device.
an error occurred while trying to connect to the group owner. tap the screen to retry connecting or tap the back button to search for a different group.
